title: Talk-a-tive
description: Created a real-time chat application using the MERN stack, integrated with Socket.IO for seamless communication, and designed a responsive frontend with Chakra UI.

title: Mystery Message
description: Developed an anonymous messaging platform using Next.js, TypeScript, and Shadcn-UI with AI integration for message suggestions and optimized sign-in pages with debouncing.

title: Backend YouTube
description: Built a comprehensive collection of Postman APIs, implemented JWT-based user authentication with bcrypt, and optimized user watch history retrieval using aggregation pipelines.
